multiplechoiceresponse.p: Land in the United States can be used to produce either soybeans or corn. The price of soybean fertilizer has fallen due to cheaper imports from China.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: What will change for soybeans and corn?

choicegroup.choice: Supply of both corn and soybeans will increase
Supply of soybeans will decrease and supply of corn will increase
Supply of soybeans will increase and the supply of corn will decrease
Quantity supplied of corn and quantity supplied of soybeans will both increase
Quantity supplied of corn and quantity supplied of soybeans will both decrease
